Speccy-Snake (1.0T) correct tape version (ssnake_kesz.z80)
by Retrojatekos
Published	Aug 04, 2017

A simple Snake game for the ZX Spectrum. Written is Sinclair BASIC.
This is a very simple game, and I'll improve it, and soon I'll publish the next (better, bug-fixed) version.
I upload it in .tap, .z80 and .mdr (Microdrive) format.



https://retrojatekos.itch.io/speccy-snake-10t-correct-tape-version
